full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,AER TE NI PAndI TA NO MIN KHANG BLO BZANG DBANG CHEN DPAL 'BAR LA GSOL 'DEBS TSIGS BCAD BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007B ZHES PA 'DI NI KHAL KHA DGA' LDAN BKRA SHIS DGE 'PHEL BCAS GRVA TSANG KHAG BZHI'I BRGYUD 'DEBS GRAS SU AER TE NI PAndI TA NO MIN KHANG BLO BZANG @008A *, ,DBANG CHEN DPAL 'BAR LA GSOL 'DEBS TSIGS BCAD GCIG DGOS ZHES BLA GRVA, PHYAG MDZOD BLO BZANG MKHAS MCHOG BCAS KYIS BSKUL NGOR, SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA BLO BZANG YE SHES KYIS SMRAS SO, ,
